entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine IHttpActivityFeatureIsAssignedToIfItExists #38736
  • .NET 6 - Cascading Value & StateHasChanged #38734
  • Quarantine LogsStartupExceptionExitError #38732
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #38730
  • Disable forceful re-render after a button click in Blazor #38728
  • The type or namespace name 'CreateBuilder' does not exist in the namespace 'WebApplication' #38727
  • Publish updated version of Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements built against .NET 6 #38724
    7.0-preview1
  • Consent cookies in Blazor Web assembly throwing errors #38723
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .NET 6 Memory Leak/Issue #38722
  • asp.net .net 6: Unauthorized access returns 403 instead 401 #38718
  • hot reload does not work with razor page project (that uses net5.0 style API) #38717
  • RedisCache update in .NET 6 breaks usage against older redis servers #38715
  • Configuring multiple authentication schemes using Microsoft Identity Web #38714
  • ASP.NET Core 5.0 still has issues with model binding positional records when running solution from VS 2019? #38713
  • Dotnet watch throws exception in Docker Linux container #38719
  • 🎅 🎄 Happy Holidays, everyone! Responses for issues may be delayed till early January #38711
    Discussions
  • blazor will auto add tag in img or css but with it added in JS it will not? #38709
    Backlog
  • Configuring Identity page URL for React AspNetCore #38708

Closed

  • Support for subdomains in a session for different domains #38712
  • Give better error description, log errors in Windows Event Log where available when app bootstrap fails #25862
    6.0.0
  • Need to bring back cookie interop test coverage in some form #38443
    7.0-preview1
  • .Net Core 6 Signal R Client to .Net Core 2 Signal R 1.0 Server #38577
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • [Blazor] Custom input component doesn't re-render #38656
  • [Big Rock] Razor compiler should generate runtime code that is usable at design time #35395
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: endpoint #38700
  • MapFallbackToPage("/_Host") triggers AmbiguousMatchException in mixed Razor Pages / Blazor Server app with .NET 6.0 #38566
  • Clarification on AuthenticateResult.NoResult vs AuthenticateResult.Failure #38685
    Discussions
  • ⏱️ Call to action: Help shape the ASP.NET Core 7 #37373
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, mapaction #38151
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #38682
  • > I am trying to access IWebHostEnvironment in a class library, referenced by my web project. It contains my business logic. #38586
  • Implement Http3 static response header compression #33980
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Could not find property 'Now' on type 'System.DateTimeOffset' in Blazor WASM #38673

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine IHttpActivityFeatureIsAssignedToIfItExists #38737
    area-runtime
  • IHtmlHelper doc: DisplayTemplates really are under Pages #38735
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix logout route casing #38725
    area-mvc
  • [DRAFT][wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Fix `components-e2e` Pipeline #38704
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine LogsStartupExceptionExitError #38733
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • DisplayFor doc: what if template file is not found #38731
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • ViewEngineResult doc: see cref="IViewEngine" #38729
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Improve static table compression to include values #38681
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Don't copy authorization header during redirects in MvcTesting #38557
    area-mvc
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove razor-compiler from aspnetcore #38706
    area-razor.compiler
  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • <see cref="DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware"/> #38659
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Bump .NET SDK again #38506
    area-infrastructure
  • Support Custom Classes for ValidationMessage #38639
    area-blazor, community-contribution
